name: Fruit Fall (itch) (Altrix Studios)
description:
It's harvest time! Use your trusty trampoline to bounce the falling fruit into the basket, ready for market! Beware the rotten fruit -- bounce them into the trash can instead!

Pass each level by collecting a certain amount of fruit within the time limit. Rarer fruits are worth more points. You lose if you run out of time, or if you bounce too many rotten fruit into the basket.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Select
  • X: Back
